ideas.title: Smart Home Gadgets
ideas.description: Tech store for affordable smart home devices and IoT products. Target budget-conscious consumers looking to automate their homes.

ideas.title: Artisan Coffee Subscription
ideas.description: Monthly subscription box featuring small-batch roasted coffee from local roasters. Include brewing guides and tasting notes.

ideas.title: Handmade Pet Accessories
ideas.description: Custom pet collars, beds, and toys made from eco-friendly materials. Personalization options for pet owners.

ideas.title: Minimalist Stationery Store
ideas.description: Clean, simple designs for planners, notebooks, and desk accessories. Target productivity enthusiasts and bullet journalers.
